alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 10:46AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River... Mississippi River at Lake City affecting Wabasha, Goodhue and Pepin Counties. Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. Mississippi River at Winona affecting Buffalo, Winona and Trempealeau Counties. Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting La Crosse, Houston and Vernon Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Grant, Clayton, Allamakee and Crawford Counties. Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to 18.5 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.4 feet on 10/05/1986. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this afternoon after 4pm.
